raw_text: GOONETILLEKE IRA – Beloved wife of the late H.L.K. (Hugh) Goonetilleke,​ precious mother of Ruani,​ beloved sister of late Chandrasoma,​ late Amitha,​ late Jaya,​ late Wimalatissa,​ late Soma,​ Vijita,​ late Dr Mala,​ late Deema and late Chinta. Cortege leaves 2/​1,​ Greenland Avenue,​ off Anderson Road,​ Nedimala,​ Dehiwela at 4.00 p.m. on Friday,​ December 1st for Cremation at Nedimala Cemetery.078844
